attributes.action: We clearly no longer wish to leave the EU, article 50 MUST be revoked.
attributes.additional_details: Some of the greatest minds on the planet have said we should remain in the EU while some still have their head stuck in the clouds dreaming of a glorious independence. We are the only intelligent life we know of in the universe and the human race continues to ignore how small and insignificant we are and continue to fight and kill each other. Man kind needs to unite, not further divide and increase the risk of extinction. We NEED to remain in the EU, our future depends on it.
attributes.background: This graph of 113 polls on "What UK Thinks" clearly shows Britain has changed its mind about leaving the EU: https://whatukthinks.org/eu/questions/in-highsight-do-you-think-britain-was-right-or-wrong-to-vote-to-leave-the-eu/
